name: Check Substrate - The surface must be clean, dry and free from all loose particles
Prepare surface to accept primer using scraper (and/or light grind) and vacuum/sweep residual debris. Remove all concrete/mortar projections.
Cutting - Make sure that adjoining ends of intersecting waterstop segments are cut extremely straight
Apply primer using a brush or roller
Epoxy Application (1st coat) - Apply Enviro Epoxy WB with a brush, roller or spray
(If no aggregate is required, 1st coat of epoxy can be dilluted with 10% xylene
If aggregate is required, broadcast at correct coverage while 1st coat has been applied and is in it's wet state prior to curing
Epoxy Application (2nd Coat) - Apply Epoxy WB with a brush, roller or spray
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured.
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
